about_the_game: A physics-based platformer about a drone looking for a way. You are hovering above the ground with electric beams. Your goal is to angle the thrusters to overcome increasingly challenging obstacles. The controls are difficult, but mastering them is all the more satisfying! It is the definition of “easy to start, hard to master”.
